item.title: META
item.description: Hi, I’m Faiz Halde. I’m a software engineer for almost a decade now. That’s right, saying “10 years” just doesn’t pack the same punch, folks. I work for @nubank, I’ve also worked for Paypal & Helpshift I have a deep interest in Distributed Systems, Databases, System Performance & in recent times with all facets of devops & big-data. I don’t discriminate programming languages however Clojure, Scala, Golang & Java are my current beloved.
